short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find the ESPN cookies you need to authenticate your private fantasy sports leagues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to find the ESPN_S2 and SWID cookie values of your ESPN fantasy sports account to authenticate your private fantasy sports leagues.
